title: Downsize Real Estate
description: Consider downsizing your real estate holding to free up capital and reduce mortgage obligations, especially since your dependents are 0.

title: Evaluate Long-Term Care Insurance
description: With a planned retirement at 55 and a life expectancy of 95, explore long-term care insurance options to mitigate potential future healthcare costs.

title: Develop a Roth Conversion Strategy
description: Consider a Roth IRA conversion strategy to potentially reduce future tax liabilities, especially given your relatively low tax bracket during early retirement.
